"Artie": "This time, let's talk about the Advanced Trainia \"Cannonball Rumble\"."
"The unique feature with that one involves the use of these giant orbs we call Cannonballs."
"When you defeat enemies, those orbs appear. If you use those orbs to hit the floating targets, even more enemies will show up."
"Rinse and repeat. It's a training regimen, but it feels kinda like a sport."
"There's quite a large number of targets, so you'll probably want to bring some friends with you to help."
"...Anyways, you'll get a better idea if you just go see for yourself."
"You should definitely give it a try."
